meanings.sent1: The shiny gimcrack caught her eye at the store.
meanings.sent2: He bought a small gimcrack as a souvenir from the carnival.
meanings.sent3: The gimcrack toy broke after just one day of play.
meanings.sent4: Her room was filled with gimcracks that served no purpose.
meanings.sent5: The street vendor sold colorful gimcracks to tourists.

meanings.definition: Cheap and showy in appearance or quality
meanings.sent2: She refused to buy the gimcrack purse due to its poor quality.
meanings.sent3: The gimcrack decorations made the party look tacky.
meanings.sent4: His speech was full of gimcrack promises that he couldn't keep.
meanings.sent5: The gimcrack watch fell apart after a few days of wear.
